about_the_game:
Embrace vibrant colors and mid-century modern design with The Sims™ 4 Cozy Kitsch Kit. Inspired by the 60s and the 70s, this collection of living room items features bold color and pattern combinations, stylish surfaces, and cute décor with delightful character. Add subtle accents to your room, or make a statement with every piece. Created by myshunosun.

KEY FEATURES
  • Play With Color — Show off trinkets on a chic faux fireplace, tune your vintage radio to your beloved station, and cozy up on your favorite corduroy sofa.

  • Make A Statement — Decorate your room with bold artwork and a daring neon sign. Combine sleek mid-century surfaces with unique heirloom finds.
detailed_description:
What's included in this pack


About the Game

Embrace vibrant colors and mid-century modern design with The Sims™ 4 Cozy Kitsch Kit. Inspired by the 60s and the 70s, this collection of living room items features bold color and pattern combinations, stylish surfaces, and cute décor with delightful character. Add subtle accents to your room, or make a statement with every piece. Created by myshunosun.

KEY FEATURES

  • Make A Statement — Decorate your room with bold artwork and a daring neon sign. Combine sleek mid-century surfaces with unique heirloom finds.

*Requires The Sims 4 & all game updates. For PC, see minimum system requirements for the pack.
**Mannequin not included.
